purpose: Provide a curated list of publicly accessible machine learning engineering courses from prestigious institutions.
principle: Aggregates and organizes educational content from various university programs and online platforms.
reusability: Can be used by educators and students to find and access machine learning courses; serves as a resource repository.
limitations: Dependent on the availability of courses from external institutions; may require updates to maintain relevance.
name: awesome-full-stack-machine-learning-courses
description: Curated list of publicly accessible machine learning engineering courses from CalTech, Columbia, Berkeley, MIT, and Stanford.
highlight: Comprehensive collection of high-quality machine learning courses from top universities.
